projects.title: 610kW Metrowalk Solar Carpark
projects.location: Metrowalk Commercial Complex, Meralco Ave., Ortigas Center, Pasig City, Philippines
projects.description: This parking compound will be shaded with high efficient solar panels that will generate electricity for the daytime demand of the Metrowalk Commercial Complex.

projects.title: 20MW Santa Solar (PV) Power Project
projects.location: Barangay Nagpanaoan, Municipality of Santa, Province of Ilocos Sur, Philippines
projects.description: This solar power plant will generate an annual yield of about 34,000 Mega-Watt Hours of clean electricity, displacing about 18,000 tons of Carbon Dioxide (CO2) per year. (DOE SESC No.: 2016-02-279)

projects.title: 7MW Santa Agro-Biomass Power Project
projects.location: Barangay Nagpanaoan, Municipality of Santa, Province of Ilocos Sur, Philippines
projects.description: Using combustion technology to convert agricultural wastes and wood chips into renewable energy, the plant will be producing an annual generation of 42,924 Mega-Watt Hours of electricity, displacing about 60,000 barrels of imported oil per year.

projects.title: 3MW Santa MSW-Biomass Power Project
projects.location: Barangay Nagpanaoan, Municipality of Santa, Province of Ilocos Sur, Philippines
projects.description: Using gasification technology to convert municipal solid wastes (MSW) into renewable energy, the plant will be producing an annual generation of 18,396 Mega-Watt Hours of electricity, displacing about 26,000 barrels of imported oil per year and helping local government units in managing municipal solid wastes.

projects.title: 3.0MW Mini HydroElectric Power Project
projects.location: Chico River, Municipality of Suyo, Province of Ilocos Sur, Philippines
projects.description: This plant will generate an annual yield of about 11,664 Mega-Watt Hours of electricity, displacing about 7,000 tons of Carbon Dioxide (CO2) per year.
